screeningSummary: Local resident seeing large bipedal creature at dusk - thirty years in area, never seen anything like it
arcNotes: Unsure witness, genuine confusion, thirty years local knowledge, unusual activity pattern

lines.text: You're on the air. What's happening in your neck of the woods?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. What's happening in your neck of the woods?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Alright, you're on. What's happening?
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. What's happening?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's happening in your neck of the woods?!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's happening in your neck of the woods?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. What's this about?
lines.voiceText: You're on. What's this about?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. So?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Oh good, a caller! What's happening?!
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a caller! What's happening?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: You're on. Describe the unusual activity in your area.
lines.voiceText: You're on. Describe the unusual activity in your area.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Strange sighting, Vern. Three nights ago, I'm letting my dog out at about 10 PM, and there's something big moving through the trees at the edge of my property. Dark, bulky. Moved smoothly for something that big.
lines.voiceText: Strange sighting, Vern. Three nights ago, I'm letting my dog out at about 10 PM, and there's something big moving through the trees at the edge of my property. Dark, bulky. Moved smoothly for something that big.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Can you describe it in more detail? Size, shape?
lines.voiceText: Can you describe it in more detail? Size, shape?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Can you describe it... size, shape?
lines.voiceText: Can you describe it... size, shape?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: SOMETHING BIG moving through trees! This is EXCITING! Details please!
lines.voiceText: SOMETHING BIG moving through trees! This is EXCITING! Details please!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Something big and bulky. Let me guess - it was blurry and hard to see?
lines.voiceText: Something big and bulky. Let me guess - it was blurry and hard to see?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Something big. Fine, describe it.
lines.voiceText: Something big. Fine, describe it.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: SOMETHING BIG at dusk! I love this! Describe it for us!
lines.voiceText: SOMETHING BIG at dusk! I love this! Describe it for us!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Estimated size parameters and body shape configuration?
lines.voiceText: Estimated size parameters and body shape configuration?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Hard to say. It was dusk, maybe fifty feet away. But it wasn't walking on four legs. It was upright. And it stopped when it noticed me watching.
lines.voiceText: Hard to say. It was dusk, maybe fifty feet away. But it wasn't walking on four legs. It was upright. And it stopped when it noticed me watching.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Stopped. Then what happened?
lines.voiceText: Stopped. Then what happened?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Stopped... and then?
lines.voiceText: Stopped... and then?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: IT STOPPED?! This is AMAZING! What happened next?!
lines.voiceText: IT STOPPED?! This is AMAZING! What happened next?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Stopped. Of course it did. Then what?
lines.voiceText: Stopped. Of course it did. Then what?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Stopped. What happened?
lines.voiceText: Stopped. What happened?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: IT STOPPED AND NOTICED YOU! This is PERFECT! What happened?!
lines.voiceText: IT STOPPED AND NOTICED YOU! This is PERFECT! What happened?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Stopped upon visual detection. What was the subsequent behavioral response?
lines.voiceText: Stopped upon visual detection. What was the subsequent behavioral response?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Just... stood there. Like it was deciding something. Then it moved deeper into the trees. Gone in seconds. My dog started howling and wouldn't stop for ten minutes.
lines.voiceText: Just... stood there. Like it was deciding something. Then it moved deeper into the trees. Gone in seconds. My dog started howling and wouldn't stop for ten minutes.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Dusk plays tricks on the eyes. Could've been a large animal - moose, bear standing up.
lines.voiceText: Dusk plays tricks on the eyes. Could've been a large animal - moose, bear standing up.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Look, dusk messes with your vision. Could've been a moose or bear...
lines.voiceText: Look, dusk messes with your vision. Could've been a moose or bear...
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Dusk can be tricky, BUT a DOG howling for ten minutes?! That's SOMETHING!
lines.voiceText: Dusk can be tricky, BUT a DOG howling for ten minutes?! That's SOMETHING!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Dusk plays tricks on the eyes. You know bears stand up sometimes, right?
lines.voiceText: Dusk plays tricks on the eyes. You know bears stand up sometimes, right?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Dusk. Could've been a bear. What's your take?
lines.voiceText: Dusk. Could've been a bear. What's your take?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Dusk + mysterious creature + howling dog = PERFECT radio! Bear, maybe?!
lines.voiceText: Dusk + mysterious creature + howling dog = PERFECT radio! Bear, maybe?!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Low light conditions. What alternative explanations have you considered? Moose, black bear, or other large fauna?
lines.voiceText: Low light conditions. What alternative explanations have you considered? Moose, black bear, or other large fauna?
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: I thought the same thing. But I've lived here thirty years, Vern. I've seen every animal that comes through. This was different. The way it moved... deliberate. And it noticed me.
lines.voiceText: I thought the same thing. But I've lived here thirty years, Vern. I've seen every animal that comes through. This was different. The way it moved... deliberate. And it noticed me.
lines.speaker: caller

lines.text: Document any future sightings. Set up a trail camera if you can. We'll track the pattern. Thanks for calling in.
lines.voiceText: Document any future sightings. Set up a trail camera if you can. We'll track the pattern. Thanks for calling in.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Yeah, maybe get a camera or something. Thanks for calling.
lines.voiceText: Yeah, maybe get a camera or something. Thanks for calling.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Document EVERYTHING! Get a TRAIL CAMERA! This is EXACTLY what we need!
lines.voiceText: Document EVERYTHING! Get a TRAIL CAMERA! This is EXACTLY what we need!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Right, well... get a camera if you can. Thanks for calling.
lines.voiceText: Right, well... get a camera if you can. Thanks for calling.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Good report. Set up a camera if you can. Thanks.
lines.voiceText: Good report. Set up a camera if you can. Thanks.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: This is GREAT! Get a CAMERA and document it! We believe you!
lines.voiceText: This is GREAT! Get a CAMERA and document it! We believe you!
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Please document any future activity with trail camera placement at strategic locations. Pattern analysis requires multiple data points. Thank you for your report.
lines.voiceText: Please document any future activity with trail camera placement at strategic locations. Pattern analysis requires multiple data points. Thank you for your report.
lines.speaker: vern

lines.text: Good idea. Already ordered a camera. Thanks for listening, Vern.
lines.voiceText: Good idea. Already ordered a camera. Thanks for listening, Vern.
lines.speaker: caller
